summary: Camera repair sequence can be bypassed on Region 3
description: Players can repair the malfunctioning cameras on Region 3 immediately upon arrival, before receiving the diagnostic report or instructions to do so. This breaks the intended narrative flow.
steps: 2. Do NOT interact with the main control panel or view the diagnostic report.
expected: Camera repair interactions should be locked or unresponsive until the diagnostic report has been viewed.
actual: Player can repair cameras immediately, bypassing the mission instructions.
